meanings.definition: A festive social gathering or party.
meanings.sent1: We had a beano at the park to celebrate the end of the school year.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood beano was filled with laughter and music.
meanings.sent3: The beano at the beach had everyone dancing in the sand.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday beano was a colorful explosion of joy.
meanings.sent5: The beano under the stars was a night to remember.

meanings.definition: A game of chance involving numbered cards.
meanings.sent1: During the beano, players eagerly awaited the winning numbers.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed playing beano together on game night.
meanings.sent3: The beano at the fair had everyone trying their luck.
meanings.sent4: In the beano hall, the atmosphere was tense with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The beano tournament attracted players from all over the city.

meanings.definition: A brand of digestive enzyme supplement.
meanings.sent1: She always takes her beano after a heavy meal to aid digestion.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a beano to help with stomach issues.
meanings.sent3: His beano pills were like little helpers for his tummy.
meanings.sent4: The beano capsules worked wonders for her indigestion.
meanings.sent5: After taking the beano, he felt relief from bloating.
